name: Fast ThriveCart
author: fastflow.io

sections.description:
Fast ThriveCart is a FastFlow add on for Fast Member. Now you can quickly and easily integrate your ThriveCart products with Fast Member and add your new customers to your WordPress membership site.

Once your customers purchase through ThriveCart they are immediately added to WordPress and your chosen Fast Member products. There is support for order bumps and upsells, giving you integration accross your entire slaes funnel.

NOTE: Fast ThriveCart requires the FastFlow Dashboard and FastMember to register the transactions and add your customer to WordPress

https://fastmember.com

You can find out more about Fast Flow here

https://fastflow.io
sections.installation:
Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the FastFlow settings page and enter your ThriveCart key.

Next edit the Fast Member product you wish to integrate with adding in your ThriveCart product ID.
